archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.2.3a: a) identified, such as: through IT helpdesk processes; suspicious or unusual activity reported by business users; output from security event management tools (or a Security Operations Centre); or notification by external parties (e.g. CERTs or law enforcement agencies)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
